name: The Unintended Seductions of a Travelling Merchant Who Just Wants to Mind Her Own Business
name_original: The Unintended Seductions of a Travelling Merchant Who Just Wants to Mind Her Own Business
description:
This game is currently in its early stages of development so the current story is limited only to the prologue and first chapter. It was made within a month for Otome Game Jam 2022 and was made by a solo game dev/artist/writer.

If you're interested in supporting me and possibly funding the game's development, please donate to my KoFi at https://ko-fi.com/mishatventures! Every dollar counts and I would be eternally grateful! ╰(*´︶`*)╯

                      

Do you ever feel like indulging in the brainless fun of an Otome game?

Well you're in luck!

With much inspiration taken from all sorts of dating-sims, this is the ultimate guilty pleasure chocked full of cheesy romantic confessions, tsunderes, obvious conversation choices and much much more!

You play as a penniless protagonist who happens upon very attractive men in her journey to find a job and pay off her father's debts.

Depending on your choices, you can build up enough affection to either score a happily ever after or continue your journey to the next readily available hot single in your area.

                       

                     

  • Female protagonist with changeable  name
  • 19,731 words of story (2-3hrs)
  • Choices that ACTUALLY affect the ending (Point based affection system built in)
  • Original concept art and backgrounds
  • An abundance of clichés and references!
  • 3 CG endings so far
                        
  • All artwork + story + programming by Mishatventures
